meanings.definition: To cross a body of water.
meanings.sent2: We will overwaters the lake on our canoe.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous duck overwaters the pond with ease.
meanings.sent4: Her determination overwaters any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The swimmer overwaters the vast ocean, feeling small yet brave.

meanings.sent1: They overwaters to the island on a sailboat.
meanings.sent2: People often overwaters by cruise ship for vacations.
meanings.sent3: The fish overwaters swiftly in the stream.
meanings.sent4: Their love for adventure overwaters any fear of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The pirate ship overwaters the waves, seeking treasure and glory.

meanings.definition: To pass over a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The bridge overwaters the river, connecting the two sides.
meanings.sent2: The airplane overwaters the ocean on its way to another continent.
meanings.sent3: The skipping stone overwaters the pond, creating ripples.
meanings.sent4: His dreams overwaters the sea of doubts and fears.
meanings.sent5: The seagull gracefully overwaters the bay, searching for food.

meanings.definition: To go beyond the water's edge.
meanings.sent1: The children overwaters the shore to collect seashells.
meanings.sent2: The explorer overwaters the coastline to discover hidden caves.
meanings.sent3: The dog excitedly overwaters the beach, chasing seagulls.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination overwaters the boundaries of reality.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity overwaters the canvas, bringing it to life.
